title: Basic Usage
content: By default, each day of the current month is displayed in the form of month.
findIntroStr: Container for displaying data in calendar format.

title: Display mode
content: The mode attribute specifies that each month of the current year is displayed. The options are year and month.
findIntroStr: Container for displaying data in calendar format.

title: Display Selected Date
content: When the date is displayed in the format of month, the selected date is displayed above the calendar box after the show-selected attribute is specified and the date cell is clicked.
findIntroStr: Container for displaying data in calendar format.

title: Custom Date Cell
content: Customize the date cell through the scope slot day.
findIntroStr: Container for displaying data in calendar format.

title: Custom Toolbar
content: Customize the required toolbar through the scope slot tool.
findIntroStr: Container for displaying data in calendar format.

title: Add Schedule Event
content:
You can use the events attribute to specify the event list. It is an object array that contains the following fields:

events Description

time: specifies the date of the event to be displayed. title: Specifies the event title. content: specifies the event content. type: specifies the theme of the dialog box that displays the event content when you hover the cursor over the event title. The options are warning, error, info, and success
findIntroStr: Container for displaying data in calendar format.
